problems.title: Merge Two Sorted Arrays
problems.description:
Problem Statement

You are given two sorted arrays of size N and M respectively.
Merge them into a single sorted array and print the result.
This is the key step in Merge Sort algorithm.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
3
1 3 5
4
2 4 6 8

Sample Output
1 2 3 4 5 6 8

Explanation:
Both arrays are merged maintaining sorted order.
problems.constraints:
1 <= N, M <= 500
-10000 <= arr[i] <= 10000
Both arrays are sorted in ascending order
